briefTitle: A Phase 3 Study of a Daclatasvir/Asunaprevir/BMS-791325 Fixed Dose Combination (FDC) in Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Study of a Daclatasvir/Asunaprevir/BMS-791325 Fixed Dose Combination (FDC) in Subjects With Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1
summary: To demonstrate the effectiveness of Daclatasvir (DCV) 3 Direct Acting Antivirals (DAA) fixed dose combination in Genotype 1 Chronic Hepatitis C subjects.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Sustained Virologic Response 12 (SVR12) in the Naive Cohort
